definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: esp. of theophanic cloud (58 t.), chiefly at Exodus in JE (less oft. P), usu. ´[[עַמּוּד הֶע]] Ex 13:21; Ex 13:22 + (v. [[עַמּוּד]]), but also ´[[ע]] alone Ex 34:5 cf. Ex 14:20 (J), Nu 10:34, Nu 11:35, Nu 14:14 (all JE); ´[[עַב־הֶע]] Ex 19:9, [[כָּבֵד]] ´[[ע]] v:Ex 19:16 (E); ´[[ע]] in P Ex 16:10, Ex 24:15 + 23 t.; also De 1:33, De 4:11, De 5:19, Ps 78:14, Ps 105:39; in temple 1Ki 8:10, 1Ki 8:11 = 2Ch 5:13, 2Ch 5:14, cf. Ez Eze 1:4, Eze 10:3, Eze 10:4; hence in gen. Ps 97:2, as symbol of protection Is 4:5; as a barrier La 3:44; cf. [[אֲבַק רַגְלָיו]] ´[[וע]] Na 1:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of rain-bow cloud Ge 9:13, Ge 9:14, Ge 9:14, Ge 9:16 (P), Ez Eze 1:28 (sim.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עֲנַן־בּׂקֶר]] Ho 6:4, Ho 13:3 (sim. of transitoriness; on phenom. in Pal. v. Chaplin:PEQ, 1883, 19), cf. Is 44:22, Job 7:9 (both id.); sim. of invasion Ez Eze 38:9, Eze 38:16, pl. Je 4:13.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: poet. in various connex. Job 26:8, Job 26:9, Job 38:9; c. [[אוֹר]] as thunder-cloud Job 37:11, Job 37:15.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: symbol. of gloom Ez Eze 30:18, Eze 32:7; [[וַעֲרָפֶל]] ´[[יוֹם ע]] Zep 1:15, Ez Eze 34:12, Joe 2:2, cf. Ez Eze 30:3 (all of day of ´[[ע]]). †
[[קְטׂרֶת]] ´[[ע]] Le 16:13 (P) cloud of incense, so Ez Eze 8:11 (del. ´[[ע]] LXX Co Berthol, not Toy).
